import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { TEInput, TERipple } from "tw-elements-react"; initTE({ Input }); export default function Contact() { const [isSent, setIsSent] = useState(false); return ( <> {!isSent ? (

Contact us

{/* */} We'll never share your email with anyone else. {/* */} {/* */}
{/* */}
) : (

Thanks for the information!

We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

) } ) }
